title: Irish Moon
description: #1 Kindle Bestseller (Fantasy Historical)CAMELOT and GAME OF THRONES fans will swoon for IRISH MOON!"Looking for a book brimming with magick and mystery? Do you dream of a Highlander washing upon your shore with a dark secret? Well, if you are anything like me, then you MUST read Irish Moon. Amber Scott weaves a mystical tale of ancient Ireland sure to ensnare and excite."-Carolyn McCrayKindle Bestseller "HeartsBlood"~A deathbed vow he cannot forget....Murder for magick. If she can master her powers before they master her....A fierce--undeniable--passion that threatens to unravel it all under an Irish Moon.~More 5/5 Stars"If you are hot for Highlanders, Irish Moon is the book for you!!"-YourNeedToRead"I am in absolute love with Irish Moon!"-Ann CharlesNearly Departed in Deadwood, 2010 Daphne Winner**For paranormal fantasy, don't miss "Fierce Dawn," and "Love Lust" by Amber Scott.**For light paranormal, try "Play Fling" by Amber Scott.Coming December 2011 "Stealing Dusk"Go to AmberScottBooks.com for newsletter sign-up where you can get exclusive news and freebies.#IrishMoon on Twitter to chat with fellow fans.
author: Amber Scott
